Article Title: IND vs SA: Unbeaten run rolls on! Gautam Gambhir's India clinch 5th T20I, seal series 3‚Äì1
Article Text:
India's head coach Gautam Gambhir, players Hardik Pandya and Sanju Samson after the team's victory (PTI Photo/Shashank Parade)

Why the Mumbai Maidans are being ignored? | Bombay Sport Exchange

NEW DELHI: India ended the T20I series against South Africa on a high by winning the fifth and final match and sealing the five-match series 3-1 on Friday at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad.With this win, India have managed to extend their unbeaten streak. They are now on a streak of 10 consecutive series wins (including major tournaments).With the 4th T20I in Lucknow being abandoned earlier because of heavy fog, everyone wanted to see a full game, and the players didn't disappoint at all.India put up a big total of 231 for 5 after South Africa won the toss and chose to bowl.The batting effort was led by Tilak Varma and Hardik Pandya . Tilak played a steady and attacking knock, scoring 73 runs off 42 balls.Hardik provided the late surge with a quick 63 off just 25 balls, hitting five 4s and five 6s. Sanju Samson and Abhishek Sharma also gave India a strong start at the top.Chasing 232, South Africa began well. Quinton de Kock was in fine form and attacked the Indian bowlers from the start. South Africa matched India‚Äôs Powerplay score and stayed in the hunt.When Dewald Brevis joined de Kock, the visitors picked up momentum. The pair played freely and took South Africa to 118 runs at the halfway mark, putting pressure back on the Indian side.At that point, the match seemed evenly balanced. That is when India captain Suryakumar Yadav turned to his most trusted bowler, Jasprit Bumrah . Bumrah made an immediate impact by dismissing de Kock with a sharp return catch. That wicket changed the game.South Africa suddenly lost their rhythm. From 120 for 1, they slipped to 135 for 5 in a short span.The middle order could not recover from the collapse. Varun Chakaravarthy added to South Africa‚Äôs problems with an impressive spell, picking up four wickets and breaking key partnerships.While Varun took the wickets, Bumrah‚Äôs spell stood out in a high-scoring match. He finished with excellent figures of 2 wickets for just 17 runs in his four overs, controlling the game when it mattered most.South Africa eventually finished on 201/8 in their 20 overs, falling 30 runs short of the target.With this victory, India won the match by 30 runs and closed the series 3-1. Hardik Pandya, who also took one wicket during his bowling, has been named the Man of the Match.
Article Summary: India beat south africa by 30 runs in the fifth t20i in ahmedabad. India won the series 3-1 and are now on a streak of 10 consecutive series wins. Hardik pandya was named the man of the match after scoring 63 off just 25 balls.

Article Title: Desai double: Anita & Kiran on Obama's 2025 favourite list
Article Text:
1

2

'Holy Cow!': Jim Jordan BLASTS Dems On Obamacare Fraud As Clock Ticks On ACA Subsidies

Former US President Barack Obama's annual list of favourite films, music and books has a way of turning personal taste into global buzz. When Prateek Kuhad's cold/mess featured on his 2019 playlist, it made the singer hot property overnight. This year, Obama's reading list has done something rarer still: it has brought together two generations of Indian writing.For 2025, Obama has picked books by Anita Desai and her daughter Kiran Desai . Kiran has already been getting rave reviews for her new novel 'The Loneliness of Sonia and Sunny', with some even dubbing it the Great American Indian novel. It made it to the Booker longlist, nearly 19 years after she won the prize for 'The Inheritance of Loss'. Though it didn't win the prize, the tale of two Indians navigating love and migration in the US resonated with readers.Anita, 88, whose latest novella 'Rosarita' is about a student stumbling on her mother's hidden past in Mexico, has been shortlisted for the Booker three times but never won. Salman Rushdie has called the mother-daughter pair "the first dynasty of modern Indian fiction." While their fiction could not be more different, their shared appearance on Obama's bookshelf marks a quiet literary milestone.
Article Summary: Obama has picked books by anita desai and her daughter kiran desai. Kiran has been getting rave reviews for her new novel 'the loneliness of sonia and sunny' anita, 88, has been shortlisted for the booker three times but never won. Salman rushdie has called the mother-daughter pair "the first dynasty of modern indian fiction"

Article Title: Luka Doncic pulls off heartfelt gesture surprising kids in Slovenia as part of pre-Christmas celebration
Article Text:
Image via getty

Luka Doncic Foundation surprised kids at Sentvid pri Sticni hospital with pizzas and gifts

What did Luka Doncic gift his teammates?

Also Read

Luka Doncic is known for his generosity in the world of basketball. Recently, he gifted 100+ e-bikes to his teammates and staff. The Los Angeles Lakers once again won everyone‚Äôs heart by carrying out an adorable gesture. On Wednesday, December 17, 2025, the athlete‚Äôs foundation went on to surprise the children at the Sentvid pri Sticni Hospital. Luka celebrated Christmas in advance while creating a ‚Äúmagical‚Äù atmosphere with pizzas and gifts.The foundation is based in Ljubljana and Los Angeles. It is a youth development foundation and tries to bring in a positive change in the world. Their work includes youth development, creative play spaces, wellness programs, research & advocacy and community partnerships. Luka has been involved in several communities, having originated from Slovenia and played in Dallas, and is now based in Los Angeles. This journey of the athlete has heavily inspired the foundation.Luka Doncic recently surprised his teammates with a special gift. Now the athlete decided to surprise a bunch of children at the Sentvid pri Sticni Hospital in Slovenia. His foundation brought in pizzas and gifts for each one of the children in the hospital.The clip that went viral displayed the happiness of these children upon receiving the gifts. The children looked both happy and surprised as they opened the gifts and munched on their pizzas. There were toys, balloons and a lot more. A letter from the Luka Doncic Foundation was attached to each one of the gifts. It was written in Slovene language and translated to, ‚ÄúHi friends, happy holidays! I hope this gift will put a smile on your face and make you very happy. I want you to know that I am very proud of your courage and strength. I wish you all the best in the new year 2026! Happy New Year!‚ÄùThe official page of the foundation posted clips and pictures from the celebration. They added a caption where the details of the event was mentioned. It read, ‚ÄúThis Wednesday, Luka created a real magical atmosphere for the children in ≈†entvid pri Stiƒçni Hospital and surprised them with a festive party with pizzas and presents! Sending you all lots of love and joy this holiday season! üéÑ‚ú®‚Äù From the clips and images uploaded, it could be seen that the gesture was well received and it was indeed a heartwarming moment for both the foundation and the children. The foundation members spent time with the children playing basketball.Los Angeles Lakers star Luka Doncic turned Santa Claus for his teammates. The athlete gifted over 100 E-Bikes to the team members and staff. It was a high-end bike, as explained by the team‚Äôs head coach, JJ Redick, in one of the interviews. All the players and members were surprised and highly excited because of the gift. There was a small bag that was hung on each bike, probably assigned to each player.
Article Summary: Los angeles lakers star luka doncic turned santa claus for his teammates. The athlete gifted over 100 e-bikes to the team members and staff. Now the athlete decided to surprise a bunch of children at the sentvid pri sticni hospital in slovenia. His foundation brought in pizzas and gifts for each one of the children.

Article Title: Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs net worth in 2025: Exploring wealth, legacy, and responsibility after Kobe Bryant‚Äôs untimely passing
Article Text:
Vanessa Bryant (Image Via: Getty Images)

What is Vanessa Bryant's net worth as of 2025?

Inside Vanessa Bryants Life, House Tour, Net Worth

How Vanessa Bryant is turning loss into leadership and lasting impact, honouring late husband Kobe Bryant and daughter Gianna Bryant?

The late Lakers legend, Kobe Bryant‚Äôs widow, Venessa Bryant, is the executor of the vast financial legacy built during Kobe Bryant's iconic NBA career. In January 2020, Kobe Bryant and their daughter Gianna died in a helicopter crash. After Bryant‚Äôs passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant inherited most of his money, including what he earned from basketball, endorsements, etc.Most of this wealth comes from his NBA salary, his investments, such as BodyArmor and their company, Bryant Stibel. Vanessa now manages these finances and makes important decisions about the family‚Äôs money. One major gain came from the sale of BodyArmor to Coca-Cola, which brought in a large amount of money for the family.As of 2025, Vanessa Bryant's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million as per Celebrity Net Worth. After Kobe Bryant‚Äôs sudden passing in 2020, Vanessa Bryant became the manager of his financial empire that he built, meaning she makes key decisions about how money and investments are handled. She continues to handle holdings in companies like BodyArmor, whose sale to Coca-Cola brought huge financial gains to the Bryant family.Vanessa also manages real estate and other assets inherited from Kobe. In 2023, Vanessa Bryant won a nearly $29 million lawsuit settlement against Los Angeles County over privacy violations after the crash. She chose to donate the money to the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation.One of Vanessa Bryant‚Äôs key roles is serving as the President and CEO of Granity Studios, the multimedia company Kobe Bryant founded. Under her leadership, the company keeps producing books, shows, and creative content inspired by Kobe‚Äôs vision.She also launched Mambacita clothing in 2021, a project honoring her late daughter Gianna Bryant. All profits from the clothing business support her foundation‚Äôs programs for young athletes. Vanessa Bryant continues to lead the Mamba & Mambacita Sports Foundation, a nonprofit that supports underserved youth athletes, along with managing ongoing brand partnerships with Nike and other key collaborators.Also Read: Kobe Bryant‚Äôs wife Vanessa Bryant shares a quiet Instagram glimpse of her new princess with 15.6 million followers
Article Summary: Vanessa bryant's net worth is estimated to be around $600 million as of 2025. She inherited most of her late husband's money after his death in 2020. She continues to lead the mamba & mambacita sports foundation, a nonprofit that supports underserved youth athletes.

Article Title: Craig Berube‚Äôs brutal 5-word message puts Auston Matthews and Maple Leafs on notice after embarrassing shutout loss
Article Text:
Craig Berube calls out Auston Matthews, Maple Leafs following humiliating 4‚Äì0 defeat (Getty Images)

Craig Berube sends blunt message after Leafs‚Äô collapse



Craig Berube does not hide behind polite answers. From his first day in Toronto, the Maple Leafs coach made it clear that accountability would not be optional. That approach collided with reality after a humbling night against Washington, when Toronto delivered its most lifeless performance of the season. The scoreboard told part of the story, but the body language told the rest. A proud roster looked disconnected, flat, and short on urgency when it mattered most.The loss also arrived at an uncomfortable moment. The Atlantic Division has offered no mercy, and Toronto‚Äôs recent stumble pushed the team toward unfamiliar territory. Expectations remain sky high, especially with a core built to contend now. When the Leafs failed to score for the first time since the spring playoffs, frustration spilled over. Berube did not soften the message, choosing honesty over comfort.After the final horn, attention quickly turned to the effort level of the team‚Äôs leaders. Berube‚Äôs response was brief, sharp, and impossible to ignore. ‚ÄúAsk those guys, not me,‚Äù he told reporters when questioned about the lack of passion, via Sportsnet on X. The comment landed like a slap of cold water. It was not dramatic, but it was deliberate. Berube shifted responsibility squarely onto the room, where it belongs.Auston Matthews sits at the center of that conversation. Through 28 games, his production has been respectable but not commanding. Fourteen goals and nine assists would satisfy many players, yet Toronto expects dominance from its captain. With a $15.2 million salary comes the burden of driving results, not just contributing. Being the fourth-highest point producer does not align with that standard.Still, context matters. Matthews has flashed his usual brilliance in stretches, reminding everyone why he is considered one of the league‚Äôs most dangerous scorers. The numbers underline his impact. Toronto owns a strong record when he scores and struggles badly when he does not. His presence shifts momentum, opens space, and fuels belief across the lineup.Berube‚Äôs message was not a condemnation. It was a challenge. The coach trusts his stars to respond, and history suggests Matthews will. When he finds his rhythm, the Leafs tend to follow. The season is far from lost, but moments like this often define it. Toronto‚Äôs response, starting with its captain, will determine whether this wake-up call sparks a rise or deepens the slide.Also Read: Maple Leafs fans on edge after reporter claims Auston Matthews trade talks may be closer than believed
Article Summary: Maple leafs coach craig berube sent blunt message after humiliating 4-0 loss to washington. Berube told reporters: "ask those guys, not me" auston matthews' performance will determine whether this is a wake-up call or not.

Article Title: Travis Kelce sparks childhood nostalgia as he reveals his collection of original Pok√©mon cards
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Jason Kelce, Travis Kelce, and Pok√©mon collection)

Bellibolt

Sandshrew

Articuno

Zapdos

Thunderbolt

Clefable

Travis Kelce cutely takes viewers back to their childhood Pok√©mon obsession by showing off some original cards

Medicham

Medicham

Travis Kelce needs some help with pronouncing Pok√©mon names while Jason Kelce was nailing the names right off the bat

In the latest promo of the New Heights podcast, Travis Kelce shows off his Pok√©mon Gold Pack. The Kansas City Chiefs star quietly opens the pack and waits for others to be patient. However, his older brother, Jason Kelce, immediately quips, ‚ÄúWait, timeout. This is legitimately a Pok√©mon? You weren‚Äôt [----] around? You weren‚Äôt a big Pok√©mon fan. I was the Pok√©mon fan!‚Äù The H-back looks up and defends himself, saying, ‚ÄúBro, I would out-Pok√©mon you in a [-----] Pok√©mon.‚Äù The older brother does not give up: ‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt even know how to play!‚Äù Taylor Swift ‚Äôs sweetheart slipped into childlike wonder, cutely looking at the card and exclaiming, ‚ÄúWhat are you talking about? Oh look, Jason,!‚Äù Jason, unfamiliar with the name, shrugged and said it must be a new one. ‚ÄúIf it‚Äôs not in the original 151,‚Äù he declared, it doesn‚Äôt count. Travis then unveiled a ‚Äú.‚Äù Jason agreed, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs an original.‚Äù The energy continued as the 35-year-old enthusiast delightedly produced ‚Äú,‚Äù then ‚Äú.‚Äù A few more cards appeared, including ‚Äú,‚Äù which Travis admired, calling it a ‚Äúsweet card.‚Äù With a wave, another card, ‚Äú,‚Äù was shown, encouraging Jason to exclaim, ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs nice!‚ÄùLater in the episode‚Äôs snippet, the 10-time Pro Bowler presents ‚Äú‚Äù and comments, ‚ÄúLooks like she‚Äôs got the BBL going.‚Äù BBL stands for Brazilian Butt Lift, a cosmetic surgery that transfers fat from areas like the stomach or thighs to the buttocks for a fuller, rounder, hourglass look. When Travis callsa Pok√©mon card that looks as if she‚Äôs had a BBL, everyone bursts out laughing. The promo ends there. How did the fans react to this promo? Let‚Äôs find out.An X user quickly expressed the desire to have this episode every week: ‚ÄúI really do like this segment ü§£ now I need you guys to keep it up every week.‚Äù A fan spoke for everyone: "I'm just flattered that Travis wanted to show us his pokemon s." Another user suggested an interesting game: ‚ÄúI‚Äôd love for them to take up Pokemon Go for awhile and talk about all the random places they go to catch Pok√©mon.Like around stadiums and such.‚Äù A third user focused on how the Kelce brothers pronounced the Pok√©mon names: ‚Äúü§£ü§£ü§£ Trav needs some help with the pronunciation but A for effort. Jason on the other hand was nailing the names right off the bat. Would like to see them play that Whose that Pok√©mon game and see how many they each get right ü§£ü§£ü§£. ‚ÄùThe Pok√©mon names are tricky to pronounce because they blend Japanese linguistic rules, such as adding vowels, with English-friendly sounds. This creates unique compound words from different concepts. For example, PIKACHU = PIKA + CHU. ‚ÄúPIKA‚Äù comes from the Japanese word ‚Äúpikapika,‚Äù meaning an electric spark or flash, and ‚ÄúCHU‚Äù comes from ‚Äúchuchu,‚Äù the sound a mouse makes. Another example: ARCANINE comes from ‚Äúarcane‚Äù means mysterious and ‚Äúcanine‚Äù means dog.Also Read: Kylie Kelce reveals her girls weren‚Äôt interested in their first Chiefs home game despite having Taylor Swift beside them
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs star travis kelce shows off his pok√©mon gold pack. Kelce needs some help with pronouncing pok√©mon names while jason kelce was nailing the names right off the bat. The pok√©mon names are tricky to pronounce because they blend japanese linguistic rules, such as adding vowels.

Article Title: Ryan O‚ÄôReilly‚Äôs comeback could be exactly what the Avalanche need to strengthen their Stanley Cup chances
Article Text:
Ryan O‚ÄôReilly linked to Avalanche return (Image via: Getty Images)

Key qualities Ryan O‚ÄôReilly offers that could transform Colorado‚Äôs championship outlook



Ryan O'Reilly & Dallas Green Talk Music and More Inside Toronto's Massey Hall | After The Horn

The Colorado Avalanche look like a team built for another deep Stanley Cup run, but in a Western Conference that punishes complacency, standing pat is rarely the best option. Even with an incredible 24-2-7 start, Colorado knows its margin for error shrinks the closer the playoffs get. Every contender searches for that one piece that pushes them from ‚Äúdangerous‚Äù to ‚Äúalmost unstoppable,‚Äù and Ryan O‚ÄôReilly might be that missing piece.Dallas is already breathing down Colorado‚Äôs neck despite key injuries, proving how quickly the standings can tighten. That reality makes depth, experience, and playoff composure more valuable than ever. It is exactly why the Avalanche exploring a reunion with O‚ÄôReilly makes so much hockey sense.Head coach Jared Bednar wants another reliable center, someone who can anchor tough minutes when the postseason intensity spikes. Jack Drury has worked hard, and Ross Colton has filled gaps when needed, but neither brings the proven playoff pedigree O‚ÄôReilly offers. The Nashville Predators veteran knows how to control games, win battles, and step up when it matters most. That is not hype; it is backed by his 2019 Stanley Cup run and Conn Smythe-winning presence with the St.Louis Blues.O‚ÄôReilly‚Äôs history with Colorado only adds intrigue. Drafted by the Avalanche in 2009, he developed into a respected two-way force before moving on and shaping an impressive career. Now 34 and still productive with 27 points in 33 games, he remains a competitive, responsible, high-IQ player. His recent frustrations in Nashville don‚Äôt change that; if anything, they reveal his competitive edge and accountability.Financially, his $4.5 million cap hit and lack of a formal no-trade clause make him a realistic target. Nashville general manager Barry Trotz would likely respect O‚ÄôReilly‚Äôs input, but the fit is hard to ignore. Colorado gets leadership, faceoff strength, penalty-kill reliability, and a player who elevates when pressure peaks. O‚ÄôReilly gets a legitimate shot at another Stanley Cup with the franchise that launched his career.If Colorado truly wants to maximise a championship window that remains wide open, adding Ryan O‚ÄôReilly could be the move that transforms a great team into the one everyone else fears to face in hockey.Also Read: https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nhl/news/nhl-trade-rumors-new-jersey-devils-linked-to-ryan-oreilly-while-edmonton-oilers-show-interest-in-tristan-jarry/articleshow/125920766.cms
Article Summary: Ryan o‚Äôreilly has been linked to a return to the colorado avalanche. The 34-year-old is a proven playoff performer with a stanley cup win to his name with the st.louis blues. O'reilly's $4.5 million cap hit and lack of a formal no-trade clause make him a realistic target.

Article Title: C.J. Nitkowski explains why Bo Bichette‚Äôs free agency has moved more slowly than expected
Article Text:
Bo Bichette (Image via: IG/X)

C.J. Nitkowski believes market depth is shaping Bo Bichette‚Äôs free agency



Blue Jays Trade Rumors: Who‚Äôs In, Who‚Äôs Out?

C.J. Nitkowski has spent years inside major league clubhouses, and he knows when a quiet market is part of a plan rather than a problem. The former MLB pitcher believes teams this offseason are operating with patience, shaped by depth and long-term thinking. Speaking on Toronto Sports Rush, Nitkowski framed the current free-agent landscape as one defined by options, not urgency.His remarks gained attention because they offered context to a situation that has puzzled many observers. Among the players affected is Bo Bichette, coming off a productive 2025 season. While Bichette‚Äôs numbers speak for themselves, Nitkowski‚Äôs view suggests the slower pace around his free agency reflects how teams are reading the broader market rather than reassessing the player himself."The one thing about teams that are looking at Bo Bichette as a second baseman that they know they can keep in mind, is that next year, the second base market is pretty flush," Nitkowski said.From Nitkowski‚Äôs perspective, that awareness changes how teams behave. Clubs are not just reacting to what is available now. They are weighing what is coming next."There are some really good options. Nico Hoerner is going to be a free agent.(Brandon) Lowe is going to be a free agent next year.There's a pretty long list."That expected depth gives teams confidence. When front offices believe alternatives will be available, the need to move quickly fades."Ozzie Albies, potentially, could be a free agent. There's some pretty good ones. Gleyber Torres out there as well." With those names in mind, Nitkowski suggested teams may feel comfortable waiting rather than stretching budgets or timelines."For the teams looking at Bo as a second baseman, I don't think they're going to necessarily overextend themselves, because if they feel like they have another solution, at least short term for 2026, they know there's a really good market out there for 2027."The takeaway from Nitkowski‚Äôs comments is measured but clear. There is little doubt about Bichette‚Äôs production with the Toronto Blue Jays. The slower pace has more to do with the market than the player. Teams believe they have alternatives coming, and that belief has allowed them to hold off. Nitkowski views the situation as a matter of timing, not talent.Also read: Why Bo Bichette remains unsigned as the Toronto Blue Jays, Los Angeles Dodgers, and Boston Red Sox make their moves
Article Summary: C.j. Nitkowski believes market depth is shaping bo bichette‚Äôs free agency. Teams believe they have alternatives coming, and that belief has allowed them to hold off. The slower pace has more to do with the market than the player.

Article Title: Puka Nacua deletes tweet after doubling down on ref criticism following Seahawks loss
Article Text:
Image via Getty

Career night ends in frustration for Rams star

Sean McVay stands by Puka Nacua

Also Read:

Los Angeles Rams wide receiver Puka Nacua once again found himself at the center of controversy following Thursday night‚Äôs dramatic loss to the Seattle Seahawks, as frustration over officiating spilled onto social media before being quickly walked back.Despite producing the best game of his young NFL career, Nacua‚Äôs postgame reaction overshadowed what should have been a headline performance.Nacua was nearly unstoppable against Seattle, finishing with 12 receptions for 225 yards and two touchdowns. The second-year receiver repeatedly torched the Seahawks‚Äô secondary and played a key role as the Rams built a commanding 16-point lead.However, Los Angeles watched that advantage disappear, eventually falling 38-37 in overtime. A late officiating decision that went against the Rams became a major talking point, drawing visible frustration from players on the sideline and fans watching at home.Shortly after the final whistle, Nacua took to X (formerly Twitter) and appeared to take a jab at NFL officials. ‚ÄúCan you say I was wrong,‚Äù he wrote, adding, ‚ÄúAppreciate you stripes for your contributions. Lol.‚ÄùThe post was deleted within minutes, but screenshots spread rapidly, ensuring the message reached a wide audience.The timing and wording were widely seen as a direct reference to a controversial late-game call that helped Seattle extend the contest and ultimately secure the win.When asked about the tweet after the game, Nacua acknowledged that emotions got the better of him. ‚ÄúIt was just a lack of awareness and frustration after a tough, intense game,‚Äù he said.The wide receiver admitted that while players often feel inconsistencies in officiating, those thoughts should remain internal. ‚ÄúThere are comments that I should definitely say in the locker room,‚Äù Nacua explained. ‚ÄúMy job is to focus on my technique so there‚Äôs no issue with the call.‚ÄùRams head coach Sean McVay was initially unaware of the deleted post during his postgame press conference, declining to comment on something he had not yet seen. However, McVay has already publicly backed Nacua earlier in the week following separate controversy stemming from a livestream appearance.‚ÄúI know this guy‚Äôs heart,‚Äù McVay said previously. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs a great kid who‚Äôs continuing to learn about the platform that he has. We‚Äôre going to put our arm around him and help him grow.‚ÄùPublic criticism of officiating has historically drawn fines from the league, and Nacua‚Äôs latest comments could again put him on the NFL‚Äôs radar. The situation comes at an awkward time, as the receiver had only just issued an apology earlier in the week for unrelated remarks.For the Rams, the priority remains correcting late-game execution after another painful loss. For Nacua, the message is becoming clearer: his elite on-field performances are undeniable, but staying out of controversy off the field will be just as important as the season progresses.
Article Summary: Los angeles rams wide receiver puka nacua took to twitter after thursday night's loss to the seattle seahawks. He appeared to take a jab at nfl officials, saying, ‚Äúcan you say i was wrong? Lol‚Äù the post was deleted within minutes, but screenshots spread rapidly, ensuring the message reached a wide audience.

Article Title: Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025: Tennis star earnings, career, endorsements, business, lifestyle, and more
Article Text:
Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025: Tennis star earnings, career, endorsements, business, lifestyle, and more (Image via Getty)

Carlos Alcaraz career and prize money growth

Carlos Alcaraz net worth in 2025 explained

Carlos Alcaraz endorsements and brand deals

Carlos Alcaraz investments, lifestyle, and recent updates

Carlos Alcaraz is one of the biggest stars in tennis today. He comes from Spain and turned pro as a teenager. Even at a young age, he has already won major titles and earned millions of dollars. In 2025, Carlos Alcaraz is not just winning matches. He is also earning big money from prize winnings and brand deals. His success on the court and his calm nature off the court have made him popular with fans and companies around the world. Let‚Äôs have a look at his net worth in 2025.Carlos Alcaraz has built most of his wealth from tennis prize money. According to the ATP Tour, he won the US Open in 2022, Wimbledon in 2023 and 2024, and the French Open in 2024. These wins brought him tens of millions of dollars.By the end of 2024, his career prize money crossed $30 million, as per ATP records. He entered the 2025 season as one of the top-ranked players in the world and remains a strong title contender in every tournament he plays.Carlos Alcaraz‚Äôs net worth in 2025 is estimated to be between $30 million and $40 million. This estimate is based on prize money, endorsements, and appearance income, according to Forbes and Celebrity Net Worth.His earnings grow every year because he reaches late rounds in most events. Even when he does not win a title, deep tournament runs still bring large payouts. His young age also means his earning potential is far from its peak.Carlos Alcaraz earns a large part of his income from endorsements. His confirmed sponsors include Nike (apparel and shoes), Babolat (racquets), and Rolex (watches).Forbes named him one of the highest-paid tennis players in 2024, mainly due to off-court income. Brands value his clean image, calm behavior, and global fan base, which continues to grow every season.Carlos Alcaraz lives a very simple and noiseless life, even though he gets a lot of money. Mainly, he trains in Spain and is very close to his family. He rarely mentions his wealth. However, it is said in the Spanish press that he has bought some properties in Spain with the money he has.In the last news, Carlos Alcaraz started the year 2025 in a perfect condition after he had closed 2024 with a very powerful note. His priority is still tennis, which proves that he is more interested in lasting acknowledgment than in the easy and quick one.Also Read: What is Maria Sharapova net worth in 2025? Tennis legend earings, business, and career success
Article Summary: Carlos alcaraz is one of the biggest stars in tennis today. He won the us open in 2022, wimbledon in 2023 and 2024, and the french open in 2024. By the end of 2024, his career prize money crossed $30 million, as per atp records. His net worth in 2025 is estimated to be between $30 and $40 million.

Article Title: ‚ÄòThank you for lifting Patrick up‚Äô: Randi Mahomes‚Äô gratitude filled response after Patrick Mahomes‚Äô knee surgery makes fans feel included and cherished
Article Text:
Randi Mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as Patrick Mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. (Image via Getty)

Patrick Mahomes‚Äô injury, surgery, and the timeline Kansas City is now staring at

Randi Mahomes thanked supporters as Patrick Mahomes posted ‚Äòwhy this had to happen‚Äô

Patrick Mahomes is already in rehab after a season-ending left knee injury, and his mom is making it clear she is reading every message that comes in. Randi Mahomes posted public thanks this week after the Kansas City Chiefs quarterback underwent surgery, telling supporters she and her family appreciate the prayers and the words of encouragement.The update lands at the worst possible moment for Kansas City. Mahomes tore his left ACL and LCL in Week 15 against the Los Angeles Chargers, and the loss pushed the Chiefs out of playoff contention for the first time in the Mahomes era.Athlon Sports reported Mahomes suffered the injury against the Chargers and later underwent surgery on Monday. The report said the procedure was performed by Dallas Cowboys head physician and orthopedic surgeon Dan Cooper. Kansas City placed Mahomes on injured reserve, and the quarterback has already begun rehab.The medical timeline matters because it shapes everything the Chiefs do next. Chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance Rick Burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months, though it could swing by a month or two in either direction, per USA Today. That puts Mahomes‚Äô 2026 season availability at the center of every offseason decision, even if the team stays quiet publicly.Mahomes‚Äô injury also closes the book on a season where he still produced. Athlon Sports noted he recorded 22 passing touchdowns and five rushing scores in 2025 before the knee gave out. Now the conversation shifts from stats to survival: how Kansas City steadies itself without the player it has been built around, and how quickly Mahomes can get back to full strength.The Chiefs missing the playoffs is the loudest headline. Athlon Sports called the Chargers loss the final blow to Kansas City‚Äôs postseason hopes. It is also a rare swing in the Mahomes era. Andy Reid‚Äôs teams had been a January constant, and Athlon Sports noted Kansas City reached the Super Bowl five times in the last six seasons, winning three. That is the standard Mahomes and the Chiefs are judged by, and it is why this injury lands like a crisis instead of a routine rehab story.The emotional side of this hit the public right away. TMZ reported Mahomes posted a message on X after the injury report became public, and he did not try to dress it up.‚ÄúDon‚Äôt know why this had to happen,‚Äù Mahomes wrote. ‚ÄúAnd not going to lie, it‚Äôs hurts. But all we can do now is Trust in God and attack every single day over and over again.‚Äù He also addressed the fan base directly in the same TMZ report.‚ÄúThank you, Chiefs kingdom, for always supporting me and for everyone who has reached out and sent prayers. I will be back stronger than ever.‚ÄùTMZ noted Randi Mahomes shared his message with a heart and prayer emoji, and her own posts kept the focus on gratitude. Athlon Sports reported she wrote a public message while also sharing about her ‚ÄúHome for the Holidays‚Äù event for the Kansas City community.‚ÄúThank you all for the prayers and kind messages for Patrick. We truly appreciate every one of them,‚Äù she wrote.Athlon Sports also reported she added a second note on her Instagram Stories. ‚ÄúThank you for lifting Patrick up in prayer. We‚Äôre so thankful for this community.‚ÄùThat is the cleanest read on the moment. The family is not selling false optimism. They are acknowledging reality, leaning on faith, and keeping the message tight: Mahomes has surgery behind him, rehab in front of him, and a fan base watching every step.For the Chiefs, the next part is not dramatic. It is practical. Mahomes‚Äô rehab is the story now, and the rest of the roster gets judged by how it responds to life without him. The one piece of good news, per Athlon Sports, is that Mahomes is on track to return to full health when the 2026 NFL season comes around. The rest is patience, and nine months can feel like forever when you are Kansas City.
Article Summary: Randi mahomes thanks fans for their prayers as patrick mahomes begins rehab after season-ending knee surgery. Mahomes tore his left acl and lcl in week 15 against the los angeles chargers. The chiefs vice president of sports medicine and performance rick burkholder said the recovery expectation is nine months.

Article Title: Miami Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa could be the next reclamation project after being eliminated from the 2025 NFL Playoffs
Article Text:
(Image via Getty: Tua Tagovailoa)

Like Sam Darnold , Baker Mayfield , and Mac Jones , a fresh start could help Tua Tagovailoa

Five landing spots for Tua Tagovailoa in 2026

New York Jets : They need a franchise quarterback and may draft one in the first round. Tagovailoa could be an inexpensive bridge quarterback with low risk and high reward.

They need a franchise quarterback and may draft one in the first round. Tagovailoa could be an inexpensive bridge quarterback with low risk and high reward. Cleveland Browns : They are also looking for a franchise quarterback because their two rookie starters have been tried this season. Dillon Gabriel was 1-5 in six starts. Shedeur Sanders is 1-3 and will start his fifth game this Sunday.

They are also looking for a franchise quarterback because their two rookie starters have been tried this season. Dillon Gabriel was 1-5 in six starts. Shedeur Sanders is 1-3 and will start his fifth game this Sunday. Las Vegas Raiders: Tagovailoa plays better in a warmer climate, so he is suited for Las Vegas. The Raiders may draft a quarterback in the first round of the 2026 season.

Tagovailoa plays better in a warmer climate, so he is suited for Las Vegas. The Raiders may draft a quarterback in the first round of the 2026 season. Arizona Cardinals: Kyler Murray‚Äôs contract will be tough to trade unless they swap him for Tagovailoa. Murray will be entering his third season of a 5-year contract extension worth $230.5 million, averaging $46.1 million per year, and he‚Äôs due $36.8 million in guaranteed money in 2026.

Kyler Murray‚Äôs contract will be tough to trade unless they swap him for Tagovailoa. Murray will be entering his third season of a 5-year contract extension worth $230.5 million, averaging $46.1 million per year, and he‚Äôs due $36.8 million in guaranteed money in 2026. Pittsburgh Steelers: They took a chance on Aaron Rodgers this season. He is 42 years old and could retire. Even if he returns, the Steelers need a quarterback for their future. Tagovailoa could learn a lot from watching Rodgers play for a season.

Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa ‚Äôs stats scream excellence: five total seasons. two postseason berths. 2022 passing yards leader. 2023 Pro Bowl winner. 2024 NFL completion percentage leader. 17,913 passing yards, 2,393 passing attempts, 1,625 completions, 118 touchdowns, and a 96.2 passer rating so far. Passer rating in 2025? 88.5. Did it fulfill the Dolphins‚Äô 25-year-old dream of winning a postseason game? No.The playoffs haven‚Äôt started. Could he land a playoff berth this season? No. Is he to be blamed for the team‚Äôs 6-8 record and early elimination? Maybe yes. Maybe not. He last played in Week 15 against the Pittsburgh Steelers, losing 28-15. On Wednesday, hoping for a better finish to the 2025 season, the Dolphins benched Tagovailoa and slated rookie quarterback Quinn Ewers to start Sunday against the Cincinnati Bengals. Again, is Tua to blame? He is already being supposedly named as the next reclamation project.The Associated Press‚Äô Rob Maaddi reported on December 19 that Tagovailoa struggled this season, and his future is uncertain. He is due $54 million guaranteed in 2026, and if the Dolphins release him, it will take a $99 million cap hit.They have a crucial decision to make.Tua does not deserve all the blame for Miami‚Äôs failures; much of it should fall on head coach Mike McDaniel. Several quarterbacks like Sam Darnold (Seattle Seahawks), Baker Mayfield (Tampa Bay Buccaneers), and Mac Jones (San Francisco 49ers) have found success this season with a fresh start. Maaddi would not count on Tagovailoa, but he feels Tua could be the next reclamation project.The Daily Mail reported five franchises where Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa, who is currently benched, could land in the 2026 season:Also Read: ‚ÄúNo moral victories‚Äù: Tua Tagovailoa's interception ended Miami Dolphins‚Äô hopes of a first win this season
Article Summary: The new york jets need a franchise quarterback and may draft one in the first round. Tagovailoa plays better in a warmer climate, so he is suited for las vegas. Arizona cardinals: kyler murray‚Äôs contract will be tough to trade unless they swap him for tua. Pittsburgh steelers: they took a chance on aaron rodgers this season.

Article Title: Maple Leafs fans on edge after reporter claims Auston Matthews trade talks may be closer than believed
Article Text:
Auston Matthews trade rumor (Getty Images)

Auston Matthews and the pressure point Toronto cannot ignore

The mood around the Maple Leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Toronto entered the season expecting its captain to set the pace, yet nights now pass where the scoreboard stays silent for stretches that feel unfamiliar. Auston Matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.What makes this moment heavier is timing. Toronto is not rebuilding or experimenting. This is a team built to win now. When production stalls at the center of that plan, anxiety spreads quickly. Conversations that once felt unthinkable are now whispered openly, not because Matthews has fallen off, but because expectations around him remain sky high.The tension spiked when Leafs reporter Howard Berger suggested the organization will not move forward until Auston Matthews asks for a trade, possibly by this year‚Äôs trade deadline. That idea alone rattled the fanbase. Matthews has been the franchise constant for nearly a decade.Imagining Toronto without him feels like pulling a load-bearing wall from the house.On the ice, the frustration has roots. Auston Matthews continues to win faceoffs, backcheck, and handle defensive responsibility. Yet Toronto pays him to swing games offensively. At five-on-five, his line has not consistently owned shifts. On the power play, the dominance that once felt automatic has faded into predictability. The looks are there, but the finish has gone missing.That gap between effort and outcome feeds scrutiny. In Toronto, leadership is judged through goals when the stakes rise. When scoring dries up, every shift becomes a test of authority and legacy. Nick Kypreos tried to strike a more hopeful tone in the Toronto Star, but optimism struggles to breathe when results lag behind reputation.The coaching staff has searched for answers. Different wingers, altered looks, and tactical tweaks have come and gone. The puck still moves well, but the instinctive scoring touch that defined Matthews has not returned with consistency. There is also quiet talk of tension with coach Craig Berube, another layer that complicates an already delicate situation.Trading a captain in his prime is not standard practice. Neither is standing still while doubt grows inside a contender. Toronto management now faces a narrow path where action and inaction both carry consequences. Whether Berger‚Äôs report proves prophetic or premature, it captures how fragile this stretch feels.Matthews remains elite. Yet in this market, elite alone no longer settles the noise. The next few months will decide more than standings. They will define how this era is remembered, and whether Auston Matthews and Toronto find clarity together or part under pressure.Also Read: Are Auston Matthews and Craig Berube drifting apart as Maple Leafs struggles spark tense locker-room speculation?
Article Summary: The mood around the maple leafs has shifted from confidence to caution. Auston matthews still generates chances, still competes hard in all three zones, but goals no longer arrive with the same inevitability. In a market that measures greatness shift by shift, that absence has grown louder than any cheer.

Article Title: Why three-time Super Bowl champion Michael Irvin compares Cowboys‚Äô performance to a ‚Äòfailing grade‚Äô
Article Text:
Here's what Michael Irvin said about the Dallas Cowboys. Source: X

Why three-time Super Bowl champion thinks the Dallas Cowboys are failing



The Cowboys are having a rough season. After a brutal loss to the Minnesota Vikings, the Dallas Cowboys' playoff hopes have been drastically slashed. It‚Äôs not impossible for them to be in the playoffs but at 6-7-1, their chances sit at just 1 per cent. Dak Prescott remains hopeful, though Dallas would need an unlikely late-season surge to reach the postseason.Hall of Fame wide receiver and three-time Super Bowl champion Michael Irvin recently spoke about the Cowboys and didn‚Äôt hold back when discussing his former team. He appeared on the Dan Patrick Show and offered a blunt assessment of the Cowboys. Dan Patrick asked him to grade the 2025 version of Dallas, and Irvin responded hilariously.‚ÄúThere is no grade to give outside of a failure grade,‚Äù Irvin responded. ‚Äú... I don‚Äôt want to hear how many records you broke this year, I don‚Äôt want to hear what you did in statistics. I want to hear wins and losses, and are you in the playoffs with a chance to win a ring‚Äîand they are not. That‚Äôs a failing grade.‚ÄùMichael Irvin himself of course, has had a legendary run with Dallas Cowboys. He was known as "The Playmaker," and won three Super Bowl rings with the team in the 1990s, as part of "The Triplets" with Troy Aikman and Emmitt Smith, in ‚Äò93, ‚Äò94 and ‚Äò96.The Cowboys‚Äô postseason isn‚Äôt exactly a shock for the fans. The team‚Äôs woes have hung over them for nearly 30 years. Dallas hasn‚Äôt advanced beyond the divisional round since its last Super Bowl win in 1995. Cowboys veteran Dak Prescott himself has led the team to the playoffs six times, but the tricky postseason run always seems to get in the way of the team‚Äôs ultimate victory.Irvin noted that Dallas has made progress in certain areas this season, and he reminded fans of certain upgrades like the addition of George Pickens and a stronger defensive line. But he still believes the Cowboys should be more proactive and strategic about approaching playoffs and function more cohesively as a team.
Article Summary: The dallas cowboys are 6-7-1 and have a 1 per cent chance of making the playoffs. Michael irvin appeared on the dan patrick show and gave the team a failing grade. Irvin won three super bowl rings with the team in the 1990s, as part of "the triplets"

Article Title: Ohio University reveals football coach Brian Smith was fired after alleged affair with undergraduate student
Article Text:
Brian Smith (via Getty Images)

University cites contract violations as Smith‚Äôs legal team pushes back

Ohio University recently dismissed head football coach Brian Smith after an internal review found that he violated the terms of his employment agreement, a decision that has quickly drawn national attention. The action comes less than a year after Smith was hired and just days before the Bobcats are set to play in a postseason bowl game.According to university officials, the firing was for misconduct they believe damaged the institution‚Äôs reputation, reportedly an extramarital affair with a student. Smith (through his attorney) strongly disputes the allegations and says the termination process was unfair. As both sides dig in, the situation has deeply affected the coach, but he is hell-bent on fighting for his innocence.In a statement released Wednesday, Dec. 17, Ohio University confirmed that the 45-year-old coach had been relieved of his duties following what was described as serious professional misconduct. Their statement read, ‚ÄúThe termination follows an administrative review of allegations that Smith violated the terms of his employment agreement by engaging in serious professional misconduct and participating in activities that reflect unfavorably on the University.The school also announced that interim head coach John Stauser will guide the team in the 2025 Scooter's Coffee Frisco Bowl against UNLV on Dec. 23. According to reporting by NPR affiliate WVXU, the decision was tied to an alleged extramarital affair between Smith and an undergraduate student.A letter from Ohio University President Lori Stewart Gonzalez referenced contract language allowing dismissal for conduct that brings the coach into ‚Äúpublic disrepute, contempt, scandal, or ridicule.‚Äù Her letter stated, ‚ÄúThis includes your participation in extramarital affairs, including one with an undergraduate student, to which you have admitted.‚ÄùGonzalez also cited an additional complaint, writing that Smith was reported to have appeared intoxicated at a public university-related event. Smith‚Äôs attorney, Rex Elliott, denied that claim, telling outlets including ESPN and The Columbus Dispatch that his client was never inebriated during any official appearance.Elliott argued that Smith was terminated without a fair chance to respond. He said the relationship involved ‚Äúconsenting adults‚Äù and claimed Smith did not know the woman was an Ohio University student. ‚ÄúShe was not a member of the athletic department, and Coach Smith could not impact her status in any way as head coach,‚Äù Elliott said.Smith, who led the Bobcats to an 8-4 record in his first season after replacing Tim Albin, is now preparing to challenge the decision. Following the announcement, Elliott elaborated that the coach is shocked and disturbed by this turn of events, and they both plan to fight this wrongful termination to protect his integrity and reputation.Also read: Former Saint Joseph‚Äôs coach Billy Lange joins New York Knicks coaching staff under Mike Brown
Article Summary: University cites contract violations as smith‚Äôs legal team pushes back. Smith (through his attorney) strongly disputes the allegations and says the termination process was unfair. The action comes less than a year after smith was hired and just days before the bobcats are set to play in a postseason bowl game.

Article Title: NBA Updates: Kevin Garnett‚Äôs new role with Minnesota Timberwolves, LaMelo Ball‚Äôs stunning comeback and more
Article Text:
Images via Getty

Kevin Garnett returns to the Minnesota Timberwolves in a new role

LaMelo Ball drops winning score in stunning comeback

Giannis Antetokounmpo‚Äôs return remains uncertain

Also Read

Comebacks and returns have marked the day of December 18, 2025. NBA legend Kevin Garnett will be returning for a new role with the Minnesota Timberwolves, as per reports. ESPN reporter Shams Charania first made the announcement. Kevin had parted ways with the Timberwolves in 2016 due to certain differences in opinion with the previous owner. Now, he shall assume a new role.While Garnett is stepping in with a new role, star athlete LaMelo Ball made a stunning comeback against the Atlanta Hawks. He led the Charlotte Hornets to an impressive win with a 7-point lead. These comebacks and return news have gotten the fans excited. Meanwhile, Giannis Antetokounmpo has not yet returned and the Milwaukee Bucks had to go against the Toronto Raptors without their star player.Kevin Garnett will assume a new role as per the agreement signed with the Minnesota Timberwolves. The NBA veteran will reportedly work on content creation, community and fan engagement. Meanwhile, the Timberwolves have decided to retire the jersey worn by the player while he was with the team. Garnett had a fallout with the then-owner of the franchise, Glen Taylor. However, the player has now built a good rapport with the current owners, Marc Lore and Alex Rodriguez.Garnett‚Äôs jersey retirement was long overdue and he will finally get it in the near future. The Timberwolves hinted at the legend‚Äôs return with just five words. They wrote, ‚ÄúThe Big Ticket is Back.‚ÄùLaMelo Ball missed the last few game s of the Charlotte Hornets due to an ankle injury. The athlete, however, made a stunning comeback in the game against the Atlanta Hawks. In the first half itself, he dropped 7 3s and racked up 21 points. Towards the end of the game, he racked up 28 points with 8 3s. He played a major role alongside Kon Knueppel in leading their team to the impressive win. Both players racked up 28 points.The final score of the game stood at 133-126, favoring the Hornets.Earlier this month, the star player of the Milwaukee Bucks, Giannis Antetokounmpo, faced an injury. Since then, the player has not returned to the court. In their recent game against the Toronto Raptors, too, the player was absent. He was listed as out in the latest injury report by the team. The Bucks lost the game by 6 points.The athlete faced a similar situation in the previous season as well. Giannis had to miss out on a few playoff games. Now the left adductor strain adds to the list of injuries sustained by the player on his lower body. His return timeline remains uncertain.These are some of the top news stories of the day. With the NBA now being several weeks into the season, keep following this segment for more updates on wins, injuries and more.
Article Summary: Nba legend kevin garnett will be returning to the minnesota timberwolves in a new role. Lamelo ball led the charlotte hornets to an impressive win with a 7-point lead. Giannis antetokounmpo has not yet returned to the milwaukee bucks.

Article Title: NHL injury update: Buffalo Sabres defenseman Conor Timmins sidelined with broken leg, expected to miss 6-8 weeks
Article Text:
Conor Timmins sidelined with broken leg (Image via: Getty Images)

Conor Timmins sidelined six to eight weeks, major setback for Buffalo Sabres blue line



Joseph Woll and Conor Timmins | Blue Room Presented by Rogers

The Buffalo Sabres have been building momentum, and Thursday night‚Äôs win over the Philadelphia Flyers looked like another positive step forward. But what should have been a satisfying victory quickly turned concerning when defenseman Conor Timmins suffered a serious injury late in the third period, suddenly shifting the mood around the team and raising immediate questions about Buffalo‚Äôs defensive depth for the coming weeks.The moment came with just over five minutes left in regulation. It initially didn‚Äôt look like a heavy collision or violent hit, but it quickly became clear that something had gone very wrong. Timmins appeared to catch a rut in the ice, his left leg bent awkwardly, and he went down in obvious pain. The Sabres went on to close out the 5-3 win, but the worry only grew afterward when Lindy Ruff confirmed the severity of the situation.Conor Timmins will likely miss six to eight weeks due to a fractured left leg, head coach Lindy Ruff announced after the game. This is a serious defensive setback for Buffalo. Timmins, 27, signed a two-year contract in the summer and is currently in his first season with the Sabres. He brings stability and experience to the back end. This injury was particularly frustrating for both the player and the team because he was fitting in well and had six assists in 32 games.The timeline means Timmins is likely out until after the NHL‚Äôs Olympic break in February, leaving Buffalo without a steady, reliable presence during an important stretch of the season. The Sabres will now need depth defenders to step up, while management may also need to reconsider lineup options as they push to stay competitive.This wasn‚Äôt the only concern on the night. Forward Tyler Kozak also left the game earlier with an upper-body injury, and Ruff did not yet have a further update on his condition. Losing two players in one game is the last thing the Sabres needed as they continue to strive for consistency and battle for a spot in the standings. In the coming weeks, attention will now turn to recovery schedules, roster modifications, and Buffalo's reaction to hardship.Also Read: Conor Timmins reunites with Maple Leafs' Bobby McMann and Joseph Woll at Coldplay concert in Toronto
Article Summary: Buffalo sabres defenseman conor timmins suffered a broken leg in thursday's 5-3 win over the philadelphia flyers. Timmins will likely miss six to eight weeks, leaving buffalo without a steady, reliable presence during an important stretch of the season. Forward tyler kozak also left the game with an upper-body injury.

Article Title: NHL trade rumors: Phillip Danault linked with potential move from LA Kings as Montreal Canadiens, New Jersey Devils and Carolina Hurricanes emerge as top contendors
Article Text:
Phillip Danault of the Los Angeles Kings skates with the puck during the second period against the Utah Mammoth (Credit: Getty Images)

Kings forward Phillip Danault's trade rumor heats up with multiple teams



This week, NHL trade rumors are focused on veteran center Phillip Danault of the Los Angeles Kings, and several reports say that Danault has officially asked to be traded. This has led several teams to look into the possibility of acquiring him. Rumors say that the Montreal Canadiens, New Jersey Devils, and Carolina Hurricanes are all interested in adding the 32-year-old forward to their teams before the NHL's annual roster freeze.Danault is in the fifth year of his six-year, $5.5 million-per-season contract, and the 2025‚Äì26 season has not started very well for him, and he has only five assists in 29 games with the Kings. This shows that he needs a fresh start that could help both him and the team. The Kings are open to trading him. But management is said to be willing to wait for the right offer to make sure they get a fair deal.The Montreal Canadiens are one of the most well-known teams that Danault has played for. The New Jersey Devils have also asked about this. Also, hoping to add a proven forward who can help in important situations. The Carolina Hurricanes, on the other hand, are also said to be looking into a possible trade for the skilled center.Mostly because they need more scoring depth and experienced players.As the NHL roster freeze on December 20 gets closer, all the teams involved are expected to finish their trade plans quickly, the Kings have to strike a balance between getting the best deal and keeping their team competitive.Fans and analysts all over the NHL are keeping a close eye on these events. All because any trade involving Phillip Danault could have a big effect on how teams work together, whether he goes back to the East Coast with Montreal or New Jersey or goes to Hurricanes.Also Read: Net worth of Auston Matthews in 2025: Details on Toronto Maple Leafs captain's earnings, salary, and contracts
Article Summary: Nhl trade rumors are focused on veteran center phillip danault of the los angeles kings. Reports say that danault has officially asked to be traded. Montreal canadiens, new jersey devils, and carolina hurricanes are all interested. Danault is in the fifth year of his six-year, $5.5 million-per-season contract.
